name: Alone In Aircraft Demo
description:
Small aircraft game demo (alpha). You play as lonely pilot in WW1 air combat. Your goal is to shoot other planes. If your plane get shot you should jump and grab other.

Maded in 3 weeks (march 2022), and still not completed.

WASD - direction

F - flip

LMB - shoot

Space - jump out of plane / open parachute

Q / E - change sit (only in bomber)

E - enter aircraft

K - spawn new aircraft

P - restart map (spawn in random plane)
